body:
I agree this should be done but unless it shows a big improvement can it
wait for 1.6. Splay or garbage with 16 or 32G heaps would be a good place
to see if this is a win.

On Monday, June 29, 2015, Austin Clements <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> Currently we perform delayed stack frees during mark termination while the
> world is stopped. As far as I can tell, there's no reason this needs to be
> done with the world stopped (except possibly for statistics), so we should
> move it after the world is started again. It does need to be done before we
> start another GC cycle, so it should probably be done before releasing the
> worldsema.
